locations.title: Folk Set
locations.description:
Deluxe edition exclusive.  Found in front of the [Front Hills](https://mapgenie.io/black-myth-wukong/maps/chapter-1?locationIds=397271) shrine.

**Set Pieces:**
- Folk Opera Mask (Headgear)
- Folk Opera Almsgiving Armor (Body)
- Folk Opera Leather Bracers (Arms)
- Folk Opera, Buskins (Legs)

**Rarity:** Uncommon 

**Defence:** 7 / 14 /  5 / 8
   
**Set Bonus:** Every Bit Counts: Moderately increases the Will gained from defeating enemies (Requires 4 Pieces Equipped)

**Type:** Arms  

**Rarity:** Uncommon 

**Defence:** 10 
   
**Effect:** After absorbing lingering will, moderately increase Maximum Health and Mana for a long duration

locations.title: Pilgrim's Set
locations.description:
Craftable upon reaching [Guanyin Temple Shrine](https://mapgenie.io/black-myth-wukong/maps/chapter-1?locationIds=397382) in the Forest of Wolves.  

**Set Pieces:**
- Pilgrim's Headband (Headgear)
- Pilgrim's Garb (Body)
- Pilgrim's Wristwraps (Arms)
- Pilgrim's Legwraps (Legs)

**Rarity:** Uncommon 

**Defence:** 7 / 14 /  5 / 8
   
**Unique Effect:** Allows using the Gourd while sprinting (headgear)

**Set Bonus:** 
- Swift Pilgrim - Moderately increases sprint speed (2 pieces equipped)
- When Sprinting, each second moderately increases attack. This effect can stack up to 10 times. (4 pieces equipped)

**Ingredients Required:**
- 4 Yarn, 1,000 Will (Head)
- 5 Yarn, 1,200 Will (Body)
- 1 Yarn, 500 Will (Arms)
- 2 Yarn, 640 Will (Legs)

locations.title: Serpentscale Set
locations.description:
Craftable upon defeating the [Whiteclad Noble](https://mapgenie.io/black-myth-wukong/maps/chapter-1?locationIds=397389) 

**Set Pieces:**
- Serpentscale Battlerobe (Body)
- Serpentscale Bracers (Arms)
- Serpentscale Gaiters (Legs)

**Rarity:** Uncommon 

**Defence:**  18 /  7 / 11
   
**Unique Effect:** 
- When health is low, slowly recovers a small amount of health; if in water, the effect is enhanced (body)	
- 3% Poison Resistance (arms)
- 2% Poison Resistance (legs)	

**Set Bonus:** 
- Wave Rider - Massively reduces stamina cost when in water (3 pieces equipped)

**Ingredients Required:**
- 5 Yarn, 1,350 Will (body)
- 1 Yarn, 720 Will (arms)
- 2 Yarn, 720 Will (legs)

locations.title: Bronze Set
locations.description:
**Location:** Craftable upon defeating [Elder Jinchi](https://mapgenie.io/black-myth-wukong/maps/chapter-1?locationIds=397381) at the Secret [Ancient Guanyin Temple](https://mapgenie.io/black-myth-wukong/maps/chapter-1?locationIds=397380)

**Set Pieces:**
- Bronze Monkey Mask (Headgear)
- Bronze Brocade Battlerobe (Body)
- Bronze armguard (Arms)
- Bronze buskins (Legs)

**Rarity:** Rare 

**Defence:**  16 / 29 /  12 / 17
   
**Unique Effect:** 
- Performing light attack folling Evanescene directly triggers the finisher of light attack combo (arms)	
- 3% Burn Resistance (headgear), 4% Burn Resistance (arms)

**Set Bonus:** 
- Evil Crasher - Deals addition damage to the enemy upon crashing their immobilization (2 pieces equipped)
- Upon crashing the immobilization of the enemy, massively reduces the cooldown for Immobilize spell (4 pieces equipped)


**Ingredients Required:**
- 4 Yarn, 1 Silk, 810 Will (headgear)
- 5 Yarn, 2 Silk, 2,000 Will (body)
- 1 Yarn, 1 Silk, 810 Will (arms)
- 2 Yarn, 1 Silk, 1,080 Will (legs)

locations.title: Ebongold Set
locations.description:
**Location:** Craftable upon defeating [Black Bear Guai](https://mapgenie.io/black-myth-wukong/maps/chapter-1?locationIds=397388) at the end of Chapter 1

**Set Pieces:**
- Ebongold Silk Robe (Body)
- Ebongold Armguard (Arms)
- Ebongold Gaiters (Legs)

**Rarity:** Rare 

**Defence:**  31 /  13 / 19
   
**Unique Effect:** 
- 4% Burn Resistance (arms)	
- After a moment in Cloud Step, considerably increases Unveiling Strike damage (legs)  
- 2% Poison Resistance (legs)	

**Set Bonus:** 
- Dance of the Black Wind: In Cloud Step, shrouding black wind will attack enemies nearby the Destined One and the decoy continuously (4 pieces required ?? - Glitch??)	

**Ingredients Required:**
- 5 Yarn, 2 Silk, 1,800 Will (body)
- 1 Yarn, 1 Silk, 810 Will (arms)
- 4 Yarn, 2 Silk, 1,080 Will (legs)

locations.title: Galeguard Set
locations.description:
Craftable upon defeating the [Stone Vanguard](https://mapgenie.io/black-myth-wukong/maps/chapter-2?locationIds=397637)

- Galeguard Beast Mask (headgear)
- Galeguard Beastmaw Armor (body)
- Galeguard Bracers (arms)
- Galeguard Greaves (legs)

**Rarity:** Rare 

**Defence:** 18 / 35 / 14 / 21 
   
**Effect:** 
- 4% Shock Resistance (body)	
- Performing 3 consecutive perfect dodges within a brief moment recovers a moderate amount of Mana (legs)	

**Set Bonus:**
- Gale Guardian: Upon perfect dodges, grants considerable additional focus (2 pieces equipped)
- Perfect dodges slightly reduces cooldown for all spells (4 pieces equipped)

locations.title: Drunken Boar's Quest
locations.description:
**How To Begin:** Speak to the [Drunken Boar](https://mapgenie.io/black-myth-wukong/maps/chapter-2?locationIds=398863)

**Steps:**

1. Give [Drunken Boar](https://mapgenie.io/black-myth-wukong/maps/chapter-2?locationIds=398863) the [Sobering Stone](https://mapgenie.io/black-myth-wukong/maps/chapter-2?locationIds=399634) (purchase from Man in Rock).
2. Find the [Drunken Boar](https://mapgenie.io/black-myth-wukong/maps/chapter-2?locationIds=399827) in the Tiger's Temple and give him the Jade Lotus.
3. Return to where he was originally and defeat the [Yellow-Robed Squire](https://mapgenie.io/black-myth-wukong/maps/chapter-2?locationIds=397644)

- Visit the first [Rattle Drum Quest Location 1](https://mapgenie.io/black-myth-wukong/maps/chapter-2?locationIds=403495)
- Visit the second [Rattle Drum Quest Location](https://mapgenie.io/black-myth-wukong/maps/chapter-2?locationIds=403497)

locations.description:
**Location:** Inside the barricaded house.

Speak with the two headed rat inside "Ashen Slumber", and listen to their dialog completely by interacting with them until you exhaust unique dialog. They will mention they are going to head West and find the "Prince". You will meet back up with their dead body in the same cell as The Third Prince.  This interaction will make it so you do not have to fight Ashen Slumber.

Blinded and deafened NPC in the cell blocked by purple seal.

Defeat Captain Lotus-Vision to enter the cell.
Defeat Captain Wise-Voice, Captain Kalpa-Wave, and Captain Void-Illusion and return to him to finish his questline.

Receive Chubai Spearhead for completion and absorb Ashen Slumber transformation from his dead cell mate.
